heroText.title: Naperville's Home For Trusted, Modern Dentistry

textBlock.text: For decades, Dr. Keith A. Brown DDS, FAGD, has expertly cared for Naperville and Chicagoland.
Start your journey towards excellent care today.

additionalInfo.text: We offer free nitrous oxide for pain-free appointments.
Discover affordable care with our flexible payment plans.

features.title: Crafting Smiles with Unmatched Dental Mastery
features.intro: At Dr. Brown's office, we specialize in solving your issues, whatever it is.

textBlock.title: Affordable Dental Solutions
textBlock.text: Accessible dental care and financing solutions tailored to you.

textBlock.title: Afterhours and Emergency Services
textBlock.text: Offering free consultations even when emergencies.

textBlock.title: Conveniently Located
textBlock.text: Visit us on the third floor of the Fifth Third Bank building at the heart of Naperville, Illinois, complete with ample parking and accessibility.

textBlock.title: A Stress-Free Dental Experience
textBlock.text: Enjoy dental care in a serene environment designed to alleviate the stress of your visit.

doctorSection.title: Dr. Keith A. Brown DDS, FAGD: A Continual Pursuit of Excellence
doctorSection.highlightedText: Dr. Keith A. Brown DDS, FAGD:

textBlock.text:
With over four decades of experience, Dr. Keith A. Brown, DDS, FAGD, is a trusted name in Naperville, delivering unmatched expertise and personalized dental care.

A Chicagoland native, Dr. Brown graduated from Naperville's North Central College and is a member of the [American Dental Association](https://www.ada.org/), the [Chicago Dental Society](https://www.cds.org/), and the [American Equilibration Society](https://www.aes-tmj.org/).

mapSection.title: Welcoming You to Your Naperville Dental Home

textBlock.text: For over 40 years, our Naperville location has been dedicated to enhancing smiles, offering exceptional dental care from our scenic third-floor office.

testimonialSection.title: But Don't Just Take Our Word For It.

textBlock.text: Hear directly from our patients:

financialSection.title: Making World-Class Dental Care Accessible to All

textBlock.text: We prioritize affordable, accessible dental care. Our clinic works with many insurance providers and offers flexible financing options with low monthly payments.

textBlock.text2: Don't have insurance or facing coverage gaps? Our office will help find financial solutions that work for you.

textBlock.text3: Our coverage includes preventive care, diagnostics, and medically necessary treatments like cleanings, fillings, and braces.

financialFAQs.question: What payment options do you offer?
financialFAQs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, insurance plans, and payment programs, offering financing options to make dental care more accessible.

financialFAQs.question: Do you offer payment plans?
financialFAQs.answer: Yes, we provide flexible payment plans for various treatments, making dental care affordable for all our patients.

financialFAQs.question: Can I use FSAs or HSAs?
financialFAQs.answer: Absolutely, FSAs and HSAs are great for covering dental expenses with pre-tax dollars, reducing your taxable income and saving you money.

financialFAQs.question: How does insurance billing work?
financialFAQs.answer: We handle the paperwork and direct bill your insurance company, ensuring you receive the benefits you are entitled to.

financialFAQs.question: Are there any hidden fees?
financialFAQs.answer: Our billing process is transparent. We provide detailed estimates before any treatment and discuss all possible costs with you.

financialFAQs.question: How can I estimate the cost of my treatment?
financialFAQs.answer: We offer free consultations to give you a detailed breakdown of potential treatments and associated costs, ensuring you make informed decisions about your dental care.

financialFAQs.question: What should I do if I don’t have dental insurance?
financialFAQs.answer: Contact our office to learn more about our financial assistance programs. We are dedicated to making quality dental care accessible to everyone.

dentalServicesSection.title: Customized Dental Services to Perfectly Match Your Needs

textBlock.text: Our practice offers a wide range of dental services, from routine checkups to advanced restorative and cosmetic treatments, all tailored to your specific oral health needs.
If it can be done, we can likely do it.

appointmentSection.title: Simplifying Your Journey with Easy Scheduling

textBlock.text: Embark on your journey to a healthier, happier smile with our easy online scheduling. We ensure top-tier dental care with unmatched patient convenience.

emergencySection.title: Emergency Dentistry: Weekend and After-Hour Care Available

textBlock.text: Dental emergencies don’t wait, and neither do we. Dr. Brown provides extended care hours for emergencies, including early mornings, evenings, and weekends.
Specific availability may vary, so calling or submitting an emergency form is the fastest way to receive help. Once Dr. Brown is notified, we'll set up a free consulation.

FAQ.question: What qualifies as a dental emergency that Dr. Brown can address?
FAQ.answer: A dental emergency includes severe pain, a broken or loose tooth, swelling, or bleeding that can't wait for a regular appointment. Dr. Brown is prepared to provide prompt advice and arrange same-day appointments for urgent care.

FAQ.question: How do I reach Dr. Brown for an emergency dental issue outside regular hours?
FAQ.answer: For immediate assistance during extended hours, click the 'Emergency Hotline' button on our website, and fill out the short form. Dr. Brown will review your submission and contact you directly to arrange care.

FAQ.question: What happens after I submit my emergency request form?
FAQ.answer: Your request is instantly sent to Dr. Brown, who will evaluate your situation based on the information provided and decide on the best immediate action, which may include a direct call, prescription, or arranging a same-day visit.

FAQ.question: Can Dr. Brown provide emergency services for any dental issue?
FAQ.answer: Dr. Brown aims to address a wide range of emergency issues. However, the most critical cases, such as severe infections or complex fractures, are prioritized. Always provide detailed information in your emergency form to assess your needs accurately.

FAQ.question: What are Dr. Brown's hours for emergency dental services?
FAQ.answer: Dr. Brown provides extended care hours for emergencies, including early mornings, evenings, and weekends. Specific availability may vary, so submitting an emergency form or calling is the fastest way to receive help.

FAQ.question: Is there an additional fee for emergency dental services?
FAQ.answer: While fees for emergency services may vary based on the treatment needed, Dr. Brown's practice prides itself on transparency. Any potential costs will be discussed upfront after assessing your emergency, ensuring no surprises.

blog.title: From the Desk of Keith Brown DDS | A Dental Health Blog
blog.highlightedText: From the Desk of Keith Brown DDS

textBlock.text: With over 40 years of experience in the field, I have learned a great deal about taking care of your teeth.
In this occasional blog series, you'll find valuable tips, the latest news, and expert advice to help you maintain a healthy smile!

makeAnAppointmentSection.title: Make an Appointment: Schedule Your Visit Today

textBlock.text: We look forward to seeing you! Dr. Brown and the team are dedicated to providing top-quality dental care for all our patients. Fill out the form below to schedule your appointment.
Please provide as much detail as possible to help us prepare for your visit. Once we receive your form, a member of our team will contact you to confirm your appointment.

insurancePage.title: We'll Help Find You the Right Financing Options
shortPolicy: We accept most insurance plans but not Medicaid (Blue Cross Community, Meridian, Aetna, Children's Health Insurance Program IllinoisAll Kids, DentaQuest and Molina Healthcare)  or Medicare.
policy: Dr. Brown's office accepts most insurance plans, but we do not accept Medicaid or Medicare, including Medicaid plans from Blue Cross Community, Meridian, Aetna Better Health, CHIP, Illinois All Kids, DentaQuest, and Molina Healthcare.

For details about your specific coverage, please call our office to speak with our insurance specialist. We offer flexible payment plans, including Care Credit, to help manage your out-of-pocket expenses.
We are committed to assisting you with your dental needs and ensuring you receive the care you require.

dentalServicesPage.title: Your One-Stop Shop For All Your Dental Needs

textBlock.text: We provide a full range of dental services, from emergency care to cosmetic procedures, along with general checkups, extractions and more. Our goal is to offer all the dental care you need in one place.
Browse our services below. If you don't see what you need, contact us to learn more.
